channel.title: Serverless on Krzysztof's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Serverless on Krzysztof's Blog

item.title: Speaker: PyCon Poland 2024
item.description: Presentation # Topic: Lambda Powertools + Pydantic - Your Best Friends for Serverless Development Language: English In a dynamic-duo presentation with Mateusz Zaremba, we addressed a common pain point in serverless development: the repetitive task of handling incoming events, parsing them, and directing them to the right functions.
